milestones.title: Started Freelancing
milestones.description: Started building a fullstack app (Django/React) for a web agency

milestones.title: Started development on Energy Dashboard
milestones.description: The app allows the user to visually analyze the electricity and gas consumption behavior of his customers in order to highlight trends and anomalies

milestones.title: Started development on Business Speed Dating
milestones.description: An app that allows the user to manage the networking events and keep track of the contacts he developed.

milestones.title: Started development on Pillole di Energia
milestones.description: Website for the promotion of my activity as an energy consultant

milestones.title: Started development on PersonalDevBot
milestones.description: A web application connected to a Twitter bot that allowed me to save personal development quotes I liked on a database and then with a simple click on a button of the UI to publish them on Twitter

milestones.title: Learning to Code!
milestones.description: Started learning to code from the book: 'Learn Python the Hard Way' by Zed A. Shaw.
